body:
So I want to start a YT channel and I'm getting Sony Vegas cracked soon, but there are a couple of things I need first.

1: I need a sick intro. Anyone know where I can get a custom one for free? Thanks.

2: How do people perfecty coordinate their music to the video? I've always been wondrering this. Here's an example...

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_zo5cAsz6z0

3: Any good tutorials on how to edit and some good render settings for Sonh Vegas? Thanks!

I'd like ANY other tips, so thanks!

replies.body:
Just get good. 


For real though, I could really only help you with thumbnails. If you want an intro I would recommend FrozenSolstice to help you out, as she has given me some good pointers to make a good intro.

reply_to.body_tagged: I don't think there's anybody I know of you can get a sick intro for free from unless it's a giveaway, sorry :/

replies.body:
Umm.. first off, you don't need to buy an intro. Second off I know a website you can customise your intros.

(www.velosofy.com)

Now, you NEED to pick a Sony Vegas intro, as the others require CINEMA 4D or After Effects. I used this app called 

Total Video Converter Lite and it lets you customise the intro you want to pick.

FUN FACT= I use this for my intro + all my videos are made using a mac. yeah, it's not hard at all!


Happy Youtubing :D

replies.body:

Make it say Vayrak, and have this song in there. From 1:05 to 1:25 will be the music.

Song: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FtveSk1N7Uo


Thanks! Is there anything else you need?

Skype is SevoMC or Sevo M.
